Class ReservaDAO

java.lang.Object
data.ReservaDAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReservaAdultDAO, ReservaChildDAO, ReservaFamDAO
public abstract class ReservaDAO extends Object
A class that implements the bookings data access via DAO
